descriptor.name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) Enrollment Specialist
descriptor.short_desc: Become an expert in helping citizens secure their future with the APY government pension scheme.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module provides comprehensive training on the Atal Pension Yojana (APY), a government-backed pension scheme for the unorganized sector. Agents will learn the contribution structure, enrollment process, and how to explain long-term pension benefits to citizens.

  1. Scheme Structure:
    Understand the age-based monthly contribution charts and the corresponding fixed pension amounts (₹1000 to ₹5000).
  2. Enrollment Process:
    Master the steps to enroll a citizen through a bank or post office, including setting up auto-debit facilities.
  3. Benefits Communication:
    Learn effective techniques to communicate the value of old-age income security and government co-contributions.

Why Take This Course:

  • Empower citizens in the unorganized sector to build a secure, post-retirement life.
  • Specialize in a high-impact social security scheme.
  • Strengthen your role as a comprehensive financial advisor for your community.
